column4: I keep getting an error when i try to access winecfg and wine uninstaller.. I keep getting fixme:wave:ALSA_AddCaptureDevice Add suppot for DSCapture
don't worry about it :)
execept i can't access winecfg or uninstaller because of it.. i just get that in the output and wine dies
i've never gotten any errors with wine before... i was installing guild wars and everything froze on me so i restarded kde and this is what happends
you are running winecfg from terminal?
yeah
hmm im getting that error too but winecfg runs anyway...

well winecfg doesnt run when i type it in.. i get 6 lines of error output after the ALSA one, also wine uninstaller won't uninstall apps while it was working, now it won't even run.. it just gives the same error output as winecfg
what are the other 6 lines?
do you want me to pastebin?
sure
ok here you go: http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/34736/
are you using the latest wine?
yup
Ok what does this error mean? X Error of failed request: BadWindow (invalid Window parameter)
haha
did you change any funky settings in winecfg before?
funky settings? no. only turning windows emulatuion from on to off...
you could try to rename your .wine folder to something else and run winecfg.. this should create a fresh .wine folder
ahh genious
keep in mind that anything you installed in the fake c drive is in the old .wine folder
ok, that worked.. now what? I just copy the files back over into the new wine folder?
